overview: Liam is a brash young man with a big ego. In order to pick up girls, he attends a sex addicts' meeting where he meets Ella. She intrigues him and proves herself to be a worthy contender. However, she isn't quite as she seems and soon discovers his true motives. She has her own plans: plans that will make Liam see the error of his ways.
tagline: Locking Horns is all Part of the Game.
title: The Stag
